name: Dosa
tagline: Python wrapper for Digital Ocean API V2
body:
DOsa
====

Python wrapper for Digital Ocean API V2

![Dosa](http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/34/Paper_Masala_Dosa.jpg/193px-Paper_Masala_Dosa.jpg)

```bash
    pip install dosa
```

```python
    import dosa

    API_KEY = 'Your API Key'

    client = dosa.Client(api_key=API_KEY)
    client.droplets.list()
    client.images.list()
    client.droplets.create(name='terminator', region='nyc2', size='512mb', \
        image='ubuntu-14-04-x32')
```
